metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3567 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Caribou due to a regression of CVE-2020-25712 fix. Anattacker could use this flaw to bypass screen-locking applications thatleverage Caribou as an input mechanism. The highest threat from thisvulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: caribou: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
